title: 'Pervert teacher offered schoolboy ride home then took him to beach for sex'
text:
Math teacher Megan Parris reportedly sexually abused one of her 16 year-old students while working at New Smyrna Beach High School in Florida (Pictures: Volusia County Sheriff’s Office/Google)

A pedophile teacher offered a 16 year-old student a ride home from school – then took him to the beach and had sex with him, cops say.

Megan Parris, 28, was arrested Thursday over claims she’d sexually abused the boy twice while working at New Smyrna Beach High School in Florida.

The math teacher reportedly began grooming the boy after he asked her for help with his work last fall.

She offered to drive him home in February this year, then stopping at her place to get something en route.

Once inside, Parris is said to have begun kissing the boy, who had grown close to her asking for homework help during fall 2018, before stripping off.

Parris was arrested and taken to Volusia County Jail, pictured, on Thursday, and is due to appear in court on Friday (Picture: Google Maps)

Her alleged predatory behavior is said to have made the boy uncomfortable, and prompted him to tell her to stop.

She did so, and drove him home, but is said to have sexually abused the boy a week later after suggesting a trip to the beach.

A fortnight later, Parris reportedly offered the boy a ride home after spotting him walking back from school, then took him to the beach where they had sex again.

She is also said to have sent him nude photos and a message saying: ‘I love you.’

The age of consent in Florida is 18 years-old.

Parris’ colleagues began to grow suspicious of her behavior after noticing them arriving at the school together on multiple occasions.

She was placed on leave in March this year after a student reported the relationship, the Daytona Beach News-Journal reported.

One of her colleagues approached deputies from Volusia County Sheriff’s Office a month later to tell them that Parris had confided she’d abused the boy.

Parris reportedly told her pal that she and her husband were in ‘a bad place’ and that she ‘just like the attention.’

The teacher has denied the allegations against her, and highlighted an inconsistency in his original story, which saw him claim one encounter had taken place at her home.

The boy told police he’d lied to avoid getting a cousin in trouble, and was able to describe an intimate scar and tattoos on the teacher’s body.

Parris was charged with abusing a student on Thursday after deputies completed an investigation into her behavior.

Her bond was set at $25,000, and she is due to appear in court on Friday afternoon.
description: Megan Parris reportedly groomed and exploited the boy after he asked for help with his schoolwork at New Smyrna Beach High School in Florida
